news_header: Asap Rocky found innocent in gun trial, avoiding 24 years in prison.
news_original_title: Räppitähti Asap Rocky todettiin syyttömäksi – oli syytettynä aseen laukaisemisesta kohti lapsuudenystäväänsä
news_text: Rapper Asap Rocky was found innocent in a gun trial, avoiding a potential 24-year prison sentence. He faced charges for firing a weapon during a dispute in Los Angeles. His childhood friend claimed he fired a handgun, but the jury acquitted him. Mayers expressed gratitude to the jury for saving his life.
